namespace = oxr_mdlc_civic_consolidators

country_event = {
	id = oxr_mdlc_civic_consolidators.3000
	title = "oxr_mdlc_civic_consolidators.3000.title"
	desc = "oxr_mdlc_civic_consolidators.3000.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_habitable_dig_site
	is_triggered_only = yes



	# alloys
	option = {
		name = "oxr_mdlc_civic_consolidators.3000.option_alloys"
		trigger = {
			from = {
				oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_has_orbital_alloys_deposits = yes
			}
		}
		allow = {
			from = {
				NOT = {
					has_planet_flag = oxr_mdlc_consolidators_planet_consolidation_in_progress
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "Planet menu picked alloys deposits for processing"
			from = {
				oxr_mdlc_planet_select_orbital_alloys_deposits_for_processing = yes
			}
		}
	}

	# dark_matter
	option = {
